asap.activemqadapters

Class AMQConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • asap.activemqadapters.AMQConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.jms.MessageListener

    public class AMQConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.jms.MessageListener
    An easy way to connect to the ActiveMQ network for simple text or XML messages. The current version can only connect to an ActiveMQ channel running on the localhost. Listeners activity (adding, removing, notifying) is done in synchronized methods.
    Author:
    Dennis Reidsma, Mark ter Maat
